Theists and Atheists
 
 I still do not know what can be done to eliminate endless conflicts between theists and atheists. But comments collected at several websites prompted me to compose a short on-line paper at:
 
 theo_sci
 
 It can probably be used to initiate an interesting discussion here. Please share this link with those who might be interested.
 
 Ludwik Kowalski
 Professor Emeritus
 Montclair State University, USA
 .
 .

 Like all spiritually dead people, atheists are morally clueless rather than morally inferior as you imply we believe. They just don't have any truly holy example like our perfectly righteous God to rely on for moral guidance as true believers in Christ do. 
 
 They also lack the indwelling of the Holy Spirit which convicts us of sin which is why atheists cover the whole gambit of what is morally acceptable to them as individuals. 
 
 The reason why the term "closed minded" fits the atheist so accurately is because no matter what evidence is proffered they will reject it out of hand because it conflicts with their preferred world view. That rejection of their spiritual side as created human beings does in fact make them true examples of stupidity.
 
 What you need to appreciate is that our criticism is meant to edify and correct you rather than condemn and insult you. For those who accept that criticism and respond to it with an open mind and heart, they will secure their eternal security as adopted children of the most high. They will discover their purpose for existing as children of the King of Kings and the Lord of Lords.
